text: Jab unhon ney apna asbaab khola to to apna sarmaya mojood paya jo unn ki janib lota diya gaya tha. Kehney lagay aey humaray baap humen aur kiya chahaiye. Dekhiye to yeh humara sarmaya bhi humen wapis lota diya gaya hai. Hum apney khaandan ko rasad laa den gay aur apney bhai ki nigrani bhi rakhen gay aur aik oont kay bojh ka ghalla ziyada layen gay. Yeh naap to boht aasan hai
